title: Howard Stern Presents-The Works of Edgar Allan Poe
description:
Howard Stern Presents-The Works Of Edgar Allan Poe  (31:36)

Celebrate Halloween 2015 with this two-part special as 
Howard Stern Presents: The Works of Edgar Allan Poe!


Act 1: Sternhurst Asylum

Dr. Drew Pinsky learns of a revolutionary system of 
treating mental illness being practiced at an insane 
asylum deep in Catskill Mountains. The good doctor quickly
learns he's in for more than he bargained for.

Based on "The System of Dr. Tarr and Professor Fether" 
this all-star cast including Adam Corolla, Robin Quivers, 
Fred Norris, Sal Governale, Richard Christy, Ronnie Mund 
and a special appearance by Howard Allan Stern will take 
you to the darkest depths of your mind.


Act 2: Robin's Treasure Chest

Robin Quivers mysteriously disappears to Sullivan's Island 
in South Carolina with her faithful man servant, then 
requests an old friend to visit her with a diabolical plan 
in mind.

Based on "The Gold Bug" starring Robin Quivers, Fred Norris 
and JD Harmeyer
